name: Dropdown

types.name: Config
types.comment: Opaque type that holds the configuration

types.name: Msg
types.comment: Opaque type for internal library messages

types.name: State
types.comment: Opaque type that holds the current state

values.name: newConfig
values.comment:
Create a new configuration. This takes:

- A message to trigger when an item is selected
- A function to get a label to display from an item


    Dropdown.newConfig OnSelect .label
values.type: (Maybe.Maybe item -> msg) -> (item -> String) -> Dropdown.Config msg item

values.name: newState
update
values.comment:
Update the component state

    DropdownMsg subMsg ->
        let
            ( updated, cmd ) =
                Dropdown.update dropdownConfig subMsg model.dropdownState
        in
            ( { model | dropdownState = updated }, cmd )
values.type: Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.Msg item -> Dropdown.State -> ( Dropdown.State, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg )

values.name: view
values.comment:
Render the view

    Html.map DropdownMsg (Dropdown.view dropdownConfig model.dropdownState model.items selectedItem)
values.type: Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.State -> List item -> Maybe.Maybe item -> Html.Html (Dropdown.Msg item)

values.name: withArrowClass
values.comment:
Add classes to the arrow icon

    Dropdown.withArrowClass "arrow" config
values.type: String -> Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.Config msg item

values.name: withClear
values.comment:
Show or hide the clear (x) button, default is true

    Dropdown.withClear False config
values.type: Bool -> Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.Config msg item

values.name: withClearClass
values.comment:
Add classes to the clear icon

    Dropdown.withClearClass "clear" config
values.type: String -> Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.Config msg item

values.name: withItemClass
values.comment:
Add classes to the items in the list

    Dropdown.withItemClass "bg-white" config
values.type: String -> Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.Config msg item

values.name: withItemStyles
values.comment:
Add styles to the items in the list

    Dropdown.withInputStyles [("color", "red")] config
values.type: List ( String, String ) -> Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.Config msg item

values.name: withMenuClass
values.comment:
Add classes to the menu (list of items)

    Dropdown.withMenuClass "bg-white" config
values.type: String -> Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.Config msg item

values.name: withMenuStyles
values.comment:
Add styles to menu

    Dropdown.withMenuStyles [("color", "red")] config
values.type: List ( String, String ) -> Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.Config msg item

values.name: withPrompt
values.comment:
Add a prompt text to be displayed when no element is selected

    Dropdown.withPrompt "Select a movie" config
values.type: String -> Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.Config msg item

values.name: withPromptClass
values.comment:
Add classes to the prompt text (When no item is selected)

    Dropdown.withPromptClass "prompt" config
values.type: String -> Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.Config msg item

values.name: withSelectedClass
values.comment:
Add classes to currently selected item in the menu

    Dropdown.withSelectedClass "bg-white" config
values.type: String -> Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.Config msg item

values.name: withSelectedStyles
values.comment:
Add styles to currently selected item in the menu

    Dropdown.withSelectedStyles [("color", "red")] config
values.type: List ( String, String ) -> Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.Config msg item

values.name: withTriggerClass
values.comment:
Add classes to trigger element

    Dropdown.withTriggerClass "bg-white" config
values.type: String -> Dropdown.Config msg item -> Dropdown.Config msg item
